title: Ostelin Vitamin D3 1000IU Capsules
description: Ostelin Vitamin D3 1000IU provides a dose of Vitamin D3 to support your bone health and boost Calcium absorption. Click here to find out more.
cleaned_text: daily dose of vitamin D3, the form found naturally in the body, in a small, easy to swallow capsule. Vitamin D is a key nutrient which supports general wellbeing as it; Maintains bone strength and muscle function Helps boosts calcium absorption Supports bone mineralisation Maintains healthy immune system function Vitamin D is made in the skin when exposed to ultraviolet light from the sun. Vitamin D is difficult to obtain from diet alone as not many foods are rich in vitamin D. People who have an indoor lifestyle or who always wear sun protection have been found to be low in vitamin D. Ostelin Vitamin D3 1000IU maintains vitamin D levels in the body. Colecalciferol 25 micrograms Store below 25C. Protect from moisture. Do not use if cap seal is broken or missing. Always read the label and follow the directions for use. Contains soya bean and sodium metabisulfite. This product is halal certified. Ostelin's Vitamin D3 ingredient is derived from the lanolin of sheep's wool. This product has been made in Australia from carefully selected high quality ingredients. Just under 1 in 4 Australian adults* don't get enough vitamin D. Take the test to see if you are at risk. Ostelin helps support your strength, inside and out. Ostelin proudly source high quality ingredients and carefully create our products following strict quality controls. The Ostelin team is just a phone call or email away.
